Name: HVAC Drops / Diffusers in suspended ceilings - No independent safety wires, SDC C

GeneralInformation.Description: Costing per 10 units, No independent safety wires
GeneralInformation.Author: Not Given
GeneralInformation.Notes: One failure is expected per 10 units.

DamageStates.Description: HVAC Drops or Diffusers Dislodges and Falls
DamageStates.RepairMeasures: Replace diffuser/drop and sections of ceiling and ducting in vicinity to which diffuser/drop is connected.
